SQL.text: SELECT MACH,SERIAL,LLI,PERIOD_END_DTE,SERVICE_DTE,DOCNUM,ECA,POSTAL_CDE,COUNTRY_CDE,WW_CDE,CASE WHEN STATUS = 'NEW' THEN 'N' WHEN STATUS = 'RESUBMIT' THEN 'R' END AS RESUBMIT_IND,'' AS LENOVO_KEY,TRANSACTION_ID,HOURS,COMPANY_NAME,CUSTOMER_PHONE,ADDRESS_FLOOR,ADDRESS_STREET,DISTRICT,CITY,STATE,CLAIM_NUMBER FROM LENOVO.BF_BILLABLE_V WHERE PERIOD_END_DTE IN (SELECT PERIOD_END_DTE FROM LENOVO.PERIOD_DATES WHERE YEAR = YEAR(CURRENT DATE - 1 MONTH) AND MONTH = MONTH(CURRENT DATE - 1 MONTH))
